{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>Bey Herrn Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE> in <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE> in <FORMAT>groß 8vo.</FORMAT> von <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR> in <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>, ohngebunden <PRIZE>46. kr.</PRIZE>; gebunden in Leder und Schlotz à <PRIZE>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> ohngebunden à <PRIZE>6. Batzen;</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anfäng der Geographie</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>12. Batzen;</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Gespräch von den Würmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE> à <PRIZE>8. Rappen,</PRIZE> und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":6,"explanation":"The XML had the following issues that were corrected:
1. Unclosed <BIBL> tag: After "Memoires de Rochester" with prize "6. Batzen;", there was a missing closing </BIBL> tag before the next entry about Maupertuis.
2. Inconsistent tag name: Changed <PRICE> to <PRIZE> in "Messung des Meridians Gradus" entry to maintain consistency with all other entries.
3. Character encoding issues: Replaced corrupted Unicode characters throughout:
   - "√ü 8v√¤" → "groß 8vo." (standard book format abbreviation)
   - "8v√¤" → "8vo." (octavo format)
   - "√† " → "à " (French preposition meaning "at")
   - "Anf√§ng" → "Anfäng" (German word)
   - "Gespr√§ch" → "Gespräch" (German word)
   - "W√ºrmen" → "Würmen" (German word for worms)
These corrections restore proper German diacritics and formatting conventions typical of 18th-century book advertisements."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>Bey Herrn Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE> in <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE> in <FORMAT>groß 8vo.</FORMAT> von <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR> in <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>, ohngebunden <PRIZE>46. kr.</PRIZE>; gebunden in Leder und Schlotz à <PRIZE>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> ohngebunden à <PRIZE>6. Batzen;</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anfäng der Geographie</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>12. Batzen;</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Gespräch von den Würmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE> à <PRIZE>8. Rappen,</PRIZE> und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.</BIBL></ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
The XML had the following issues that were corrected:
1. Unclosed <BIBL> tag: After "Memoires de Rochester" with prize "6. Batzen;", there was a missing closing </BIBL> tag before the next entry about Maupertuis.
2. Inconsistent tag name: Changed <PRICE> to <PRIZE> in "Messung des Meridians Gradus" entry to maintain consistency with all other entries.
3. Character encoding issues: Replaced corrupted Unicode characters throughout:
   - "√ü 8v√¤" → "groß 8vo." (standard book format abbreviation)
   - "8v√¤" → "8vo." (octavo format)
   - "√† " → "à " (French preposition meaning "at")
   - "Anf√§ng" → "Anfäng" (German word)
   - "Gespr√§ch" → "Gespräch" (German word)
   - "W√ºrmen" → "Würmen" (German word for worms)
These corrections restore proper German diacritics and formatting conventions typical of 18th-century book advertisements.
